p: Of the 106 pre-pandemic serum samples tested, the EDI assay had one false positive and 3 borderline-positive samples, while the Euroimmun assay had 3 false positives and 2 borderline-positive samples. Only one sample tested borderline in both assays ( Fig. 2). The EDI positive sample and remaining two borderline samples were negative in the Euroimmun assay and the Euroimmun positives and remaining borderline sample were negative in the EDI assay.
